1.0.1.name: connect20/RLTSquare_Productimage
1.0.1.description:
The Images extension helps you to find the required product among thousand of products. You don’t need to view each product separately to find or inspect either product image is uploaded or not.

This extension also enhances the admin product grid by adding a product image column there. The admin has the control to show/hide this column and the product image size. The extra columns can be added to show the base, thumbnail and small image.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.0.0.name: connect20/RLTSquare_Productimage
1.0.0.description: Enhance the admin product grid to add a product image column there. Full control from admin to show/hide column and product image size from admin.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
